Name: Shuri's Sunbird
Description: Black Panther film action aboard the Sunbird¬An impressive recreation of Shuri’s Sunbird aircraft from Marvel Studios’ Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.¬Play¬Reconfigures for endless play possibilities¬Sunbird features hinged wings that fold forwards and backwards and 2 big engines on ball joints that kids can tilt and rotate.¬Shuri's Sunbird¬Rotate the mega engines¬The 2 engines have ball joints for maximum adjustability.¬Fold back the wings¬The wings can fold away as Sunbird soars through the skies.¬Go into battle¬Blast the enemy with 2 front-mounted stud shooters.¬Rewarding building challenge¬The fun building experience develops kids’ skills as they discover the joy of creative construction.¬Great gift for kids¬Includes cool Shuri, Riri, Nakia and Attuma minifigures, plus a spear, fighting rings and a jetpack.
